name: One last day (itch) (Ponponron)
description:
I made it in one hour, I want to test a idea :p if you download it, I would love a review.

You have have only one day to live, what should you do ?

a short game (5min) with :

-6 endings

-killer cats

-retro (reallly retro) graphics

 this is a early prototype if you have any ideas for this game, share it in the comments.
